label: 観応の擾乱
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
見出し読み: かんのう の じょうらん
説明文: A complex political struggle initiating in 1350, pitting Ashikaga Takauji against his brother Tadayoshi. This rift within the Ashikaga regime allowed for Southern Court supporters, such as Kitabatake Chikafusa, to kidnap the Jimyo'in emperors and steal their regalia, thereby leading to an epistemological crisis.
